### UBC MDS Capstone Project: Solving Set Pieces
[**Vancouver Whitecaps FC**](https://www.whitecapsfc.com/) \
_May - June 2025_
:::
:::

For the last 2 months of my 10-month Master of Data Science degree at UBC (currently in progress), I partnered with Vancouver's professional Major League Soccer (MLS) team, Vancouver Whitecaps FC. The project aims to optimize strategy, predict outcomes, and evaluate performance for the team's set-pieces.

### [Chess Dashboard](https://github.com/nvarabioff/chess-dashboard)
_March 2025_

For an individual school project, I wanted to visualize the entire history of chess games I have played on the free online chess platform [lichess](https://lichess.org/). I created a dashboard using Shiny to visualize my games.
